org.apache.paimon.operation

Interface SplitRead<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of record to read.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IncrementalDiffSplitRead, MergeFileSplitRead, RawFileSplitRead

    public interface SplitRead<T>
    Read operation which provides RecordReader creation.
